name: Astrophobia (Dr. Didjet)
description:
In this Roguelike side scroller, you are trapped in your own ship with a dangerous entity that corrupts everything around it. Get ready for this action packed adventure filled with unique monsters that grow stronger the deeper you go into the  randomized ship.

gather weapons and power-ups to better explore and further loot the ship

fight for your life against dozens of deadly and disgusting monsters and  bosses

free your crewmates and play as multiple different classes, each that play differently 

Hours of gameplay,  FOR FREE.

Email: dr.didjet@gmail.com

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_wVVidfQE3_L8LkylOYGFQ
